page.title: 05PEEL ACRES FRUIT FARM
page.content: PEEL ACRES FARM HAS BEEN IN EXISTANCE FOR MANY YEARS BUT IT IS ONLY IN THE LAST FIVE YEARS THAT THE FARM HAS STARTED GROWING SOFT FRUITS.AT FIRST HE SOLD HIS CROP TO WHOLESALE FRUIT AND VEGETABLE MERCHANTS BUT IN THE LAST TWO YEARS DECIDED TO MAKE A CHANGE.HE NOW ADVERTISES AT THE GATEWAY TO HIS FARM AND IN THE LOCAL PRESS FOR THE GENERAL PUBLIC TO COME TO HIS FARM AND PICK THERE OWN SOFT FRUIT.HE ACCEPTS THAT THEY WILL EAT SOME AS THEY GO ALONG AND INCLUDES THIS IN THE PRICE OF CHARGES WHEN THEY WEIGH WHAT THEY HAVE PICKED.THIS WAS VERY SUCCESSFUL LAST YEAR (1984) WHEN THE WEATHER WAS VERY GOOD AND HE HAD PEOPLE VISITING HIS FARM TO PICK STRAWBERRIES,RASPBERRIES AND GOOSBERRIES WHEN THEY WERE IN SEASON. UNFORTUNATELY THE WEATHER HAS NOT BEEN SO KIND TO HIM THIS YEAR AND MUCH OF
